```{r}

  `95 Lower` = c(

    609, 609, 609, 609, 609,        # Middle East & North Africa

    1142, 1169, 1172, 1172, 1172,   # Latin America
    1284, 1288, 1325, 1317, 1309,   # Europe & Central Asia

kable(final_table, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE)
```
